product_name: SAMSUNG Odyssey G5 1000R 86.36 cm (34 inch) Curved WQHD VA Panel with HDR 10, Game Style UI, Borderless UltraWide Gaming Monitor (LC34G55TWWWXXL) (AMD Free Sync, Response Time: 1 ms, 165 Hz Refresh Rate)
description: When it comes to gaming, it's all about the experience. The Samsung Odyssey G5 Gaming Monitor takes your gaming adventures to an entirely new level of immersion and excitement. With its optimal curve, boundary-pushing graphics, lightning-fast performance, and futuristic design, it sets a standard for gaming monitors. Immerse yourself in games like never before, and experience heart-pounding adventures that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The Odyssey G5 is not just a monitor; it's your ticket to gaming greatness.
key_features: Response Time: 1 ms | Refresh Rate: 165 Hz
